Intro to vueR

Kenton Russell

2017-10-10

All the awesomeness of Vue.js is available in R with vueR. We will work through some of the examples to give you a feel for both Vue.js and how to incorporate this powerful binding framework in your R workflows.

Developed by Evan You, Kent Russell.
